channel.title: Serializer on Ruddra
channel.description: Recent content in Serializer on Ruddra

item.title: Django Serialize ForeignKey, ManyToMany, Instance, Property Method
item.description: Django’s serialization framework provides a mechanism for “translating” Django models into other formats. Usually they are in json output, yaml output, XML output, GeoJSON output etc text based formats. Here, we are going to supercharge these serializers to do more things, even try to render properties method and instance method.
